ANTIBIOTICS?
As described above, antibiotics prevent and treat bacterial infections. If a baby has an  
infection, or has risk factors for infection, then antibiotic treatment will help to prevent  
infection-related complications.13 Babies are particularly susceptible to infections because 
their immune systems are relatively weak. It is urgent that babies with an infection or risk 
factors for an infection be treated immediately. The Checklist user should confirm whether
